code: export var mediaQuery=function mediaQuery(maxWidth){return"\n\t@media (max-width: ".concat(maxWidth,"px)\n");};export var mediaValue={xlarge:1600,large:1440,medium:1200,small:702,xsmall:350};var media={xlarge:mediaQuery(mediaValue.xlarge),large:mediaQuery(mediaValue.large),medium:mediaQuery(mediaValue.medium),small:mediaQuery(mediaValue.small),xsmall:mediaQuery(mediaValue.xsmall),custom:mediaQuery};export default media;
